toast.copySuggestionSuccess: All iteration suggestions have been copied.
toast.enhancingWithModel: Enhancing prompt with {{modelName}} model, please wait...
toast.saveAsNewVersionSuccess: Your changes have been saved as a new version.
toast.analyzePromptLLMFailed: LLM analysis failed, rolled back to local analysis.
toast.iterationFailed: An error occurred during the iteration process.
toast.testError: An error occurred during the testing process.
toast.originalResponseCompleted: Original prompt response has been completed.
toast.noInterfaceToEdit: Cannot find the interface to edit
toast.noInterfaceToDelete: The interface to be deleted cannot be found.
toast.fillAPIKey_BaseURL: Please fill in the API Key and Base URL first.
toast.getModelListFailed: Failed to retrieve the model list
toast.connectionFailed: Connection failed, please check your API configuration.
toast.reasonNoBaseUrl: Please configure API Base URL first

promptBooster.enhancedPromptPlaceholder: The optimized prompt will be displayed here.
promptBooster.confirmResetMsg: Are you sure you want to clear all content and start over? This action cannot be undone.

iterationDialog.title: Prompt iteration
iterationDialog.selectTemplate: Please select the iteration prompt template:
iterationDialog.enterDirection: Please enter the direction for optimization:
iterationDialog.directionPlaceholder: Example: Simplify the prompt, include feature details, etc.

drawer.title: Enhanced prompt analysis
drawer.description: View evaluation results and optimization suggestions for each dimension of the prompt.

testResult.title: Prompt comparison test
testResult.inputPlaceholder: Input test content, and it will be combined with the system prompt for testing...
testResult.noResponseYet: No response content available, please run the test...

history.title: History record
history.noHistoryHint: Optimized prompts will display history here.
history.confirmClearMsg: Are you sure you want to clear all history? This action cannot be undone.
history.confirmDeleteTitle: Confirm deletion of the entire prompt group
history.confirmDeleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete all versions of this prompt set? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: AI Model Interface Settings
settings.noModels: No model configuration available, please click the "Add Custom Interface" button to create.
settings.confirmDeleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete the interface "{{name}}"?
settings.apiKeyShow: Hold and keep pressing the button to display the API Key
settings.apiEndpointCustomHint: Endpoint paths, such as: /v1/chat/completions or /api/generate (excluding base URL)
settings.apiEndpointBuiltInHint: Leaving it blank will use the default endpoint, which is /v1/chat/completions for most models.
settings.interfaceNameHint: The interface name is automatically generated by combining the supplier name and model name.
